comment._content: Mort Bay aka Waterview Bay, Balmain, c.1930 (from the state of the bridge). See 1919 interactive map - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview/?pi=nla.map-gmod72-sd&rgn=... Fantastic details in the large size ...
